name: oatpp/oatpp-libressl
description: oatpp secure ConnectionProvider based on libressl

versions.manifest:
targets = [ "//:oatpp-libressl" ]

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/oatpp"
version = "branch=master"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/libressl-portable"
version = "branch=master"
private = true
versions.lockFile:
manifest = "e86ed7222da0cab8ea840daa89344966c646d3ae23dffd54d06f8573f94188a7"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/libressl-portable"
target = "//:crypto"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/libressl-portable"
target = "//:ssl"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/libressl-portable"
target = "//:tls"

[[dependency]]
package = "github.com/buckaroo-pm/oatpp"
target = "//:oatpp"

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/libressl-portable"]
version = "branch=master"
revision = "b3560e427bca86d1a36e8de953fa043fb27587d1"

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/oatpp"]
version = "branch=master"
revision = "148e47df363ebea5b8d99476d0741a47ccf75623"

[lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/oatpp".lock."github.com/buckaroo-pm/host-pthread"]
version = "branch=master"
revision = "a62519aa69c8e3243d6065fbf4c1d2de072f86f6"
versions.buck:
load('//:subdir_glob.bzl', 'subdir_glob')
load('//:buckaroo_macros.bzl', 'buckaroo_deps')

cxx_library(
  name = 'oatpp-libressl', 
  header_namespace = 'oatpp-libressl', 
  exported_headers = subdir_glob([
    ('', '*.hpp'), 
    ('', 'client/**/*.hpp'), 
    ('', 'server/**/*.hpp'), 
  ]), 
  srcs = glob([
    '*.cpp', 
    'client/**/*.cpp', 
    'server/**/*.cpp', 
  ]), 
  deps = buckaroo_deps(), 
  visibility = [
    'PUBLIC', 
  ],
)
